original_title: 某有名飲料メーカーキャンペーンガールにも選出！！元グラビアアイドルが人妻になってAVへ―。 奇跡のJカップBODY 舞羽美翔 36歳 AVDEBUT
overview: A miraculous J-cup & astonishing glamorous body that makes any man want to suck, former gravure married woman "Mito Maiha" (Minato Maiha) 36-year-old AV debut! ! Misho, who was shining on the front stage, such as working as a campaign girl for a certain famous beverage maker, retired after her marriage. However, she was not always satisfied with her mediocre life with her husband, and decided to step in front of the camera again on the 10th anniversary of her marriage. She boldly exposes the body of a married woman who is obscene more than her active age.
title: Selected To Be A Campaign Girl By A Famous Beverage Producer!! This Former Gravure Model Gets Married But Then Makes Adult Videos. Wonderful J Cup BODY. Minato Maiha (36). AV DEBUT.
